src.game
Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
  src.game.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This is the class for enemy objects in the world. Will keep track of the current stats of the enemy and the methods that can be performed on the enemy.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/11/07
See Also:

getType

public Enemies getType()
Accessor for the type of enemy.

Returns:

activate

public void activate()
Activates the enemy. The enemy will then move or attack. This is called on all enemies in range of a player.

getStartingLand

public StreetType getStartingLand()
Get the type of street this enemy started in. Null if it was not a street

Returns:
StreetType : starting street type

decrementHitCounter

public void decrementHitCounter()
If the hit counter is currently active, it will decrease it by one. If after the decrease, the hit counter is 0, it will set the justHit variable to false.

save

public void save(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
Writes the enemy to the output stream.

public void load(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
Loads the enemy from the input stream.
